text: Albertus Perk was a fencer from Netherlands. Perk competed at the 1912 Summer Olympics. He was born on 16 September 1887 and died on 14 May 1919.Albertus Perk == References == Category:1887 births Category:1919 deaths Category:Dutch fencers Category:Olympians for the Netherlands Category:Sportspeople from North Holland
title: Albertus Perk
